ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update an IM Directory Group
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update an IM Directory Group
ActivityMetadata.Description: Update an [IM directory group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749815-IM-Management) under your account. **Scopes**: `imgroup:write:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Update an IM Directory Group

Update an [IM directory group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749815-IM-Management) under your account. **Scopes**: `imgroup:write:admin`

Method: Patch

OperationID: imGroupUpdate

EndPoint:

/im/groups/{groupId}
